# Input file for DIAL client

# List the applications defined.
# Valid applications that should exist on your DIAL server implementation
addApplication=YouTube

# Error applications that should not exist on your DIAL server implementation
addErrorApplication=Netflix
addErrorApplication=youtube
addErrorApplication=YouTube1

# Launch the YouTube application
# HTTP response should be 201
# HTTP response header should contain a Location header
launch=YouTube httpresponse=201 httpresponse=Created httpresponseheader=Location
sleep=6000

# Get the status of the application, it should be running
status=YouTube httpresponse=200 resultbody=state resultbody=running

# Stop the YouTube application, wait for 1 second while it shuts down.
stop=YouTube
sleep=1000

# Call stop again and ensure the implementation returns the proper response
stop=YouTube httpresponse=404

# Get the status of the YouTube application and ensure it returns stopped
status=YouTube httpresponse=200 resultbody=state resultbody=stopped
sleep=2000

# Launch the application with a parameter
# NOTE: This test can not ensure that the parameter was taken properly
launch=YouTube param="YOUTUBE&WAS+HERE" httpresponse=201 httpresponse=Created httpresponseheader=Location
sleep=6000

# Ensure the application is running
status=YouTube httpresponse=200 resultbody=state resultbody=running

# This will launch YouTube with the same parameter.  *YouTube should not relaunch*
launch=YouTube param="YOUTUBE&WAS*HERE" httpresponse=201 httpresponse=Created httpresponseheader=Location
sleep=6000

# Ensure the application is running
status=YouTube httpresponse=200 resultbody=state resultbody=running

# This will launch YouTube with a different parameter.  *YouTube should not relaunch*
launch=YouTube param="&&&%%%ThisShouldRelaunch%%%" httpresponse=201 httpresponse=Created httpresponseheader=Location
sleep=6000

# Ensure the application is running
status=YouTube httpresponse=200 resultbody=state resultbody=running

# Stop YouTube
stop=YouTube
sleep=1500

# Make sure YouTube is reported as stopped
status=YouTube httpresponse=200 resultbody=state resultbody=stopped

# Test a parameter with over 4096 bytes and ensure 413 is returned.
launch=YouTube param="" httpresponse=413

# Test for case sensitivity
launch=youtube httpresponse=404
sleep=200

# Ensure the server is checking the full application name
launch=YouTube1 httpresponse=404
sleep=200

# This executes correctly, but fails the XML
status=YouTube1 httpresponse=404
sleep=200

# Currently can't run this test, the code won't execute a stop without a stop URL.
#stop=YouTube1 httpresponse=404

# Test ALL valid applications
status=ALL httpresponse=200 resultbody=state resultbody=stopped
